医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
自闭症特征与探索游戏成功之间存在关联一项针对大学生的研究结果强调了自闭症特征如何影响探索行为，并对增强学习过程产生影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241031/Association-found- Between-autistic-traits-and-success-at-an-exploration-game.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241031/Association-found- Between-autistic-traits-and-success-at-an-exploration-game.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e89cf3f-0d35-4e61-b0f0-38eadf8b635c Thu, 31 Oct 2024 15:32:00 -0400 Association found between autistic traits and success at an exploration game
1950 年代的食糖配给政策降低了高血压和糖尿病的风险该研究将生命早期的糖暴露与慢性疾病风险联系起来，表明限制糖可以增强健康并减少糖尿病和高血压。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241031/1950e28099s-sugar-rationing-policies-reduced-risk-of-hypertension-and-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241031/1950e28099s-sugar-rationing-policies-reduced-risk-of-hypertension-and-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3c9cd82-1114-4b66-8871-e98182df44bd Thu, 31 Oct 2024 15:05:00 -0400 1950’s sugar rationing policies reduced risks of hypertension and diabetes
疫情期间经常一起吃饭的家庭有更积极的互动一项研究表明，在 COVID-19 期间增加家庭聚餐频率会对儿童和成人的心理健康和社交互动产生积极影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241031/Families-who-ate-together-more-often-during-the-pandemic-had-more-positive-interactions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241031/Families-who-ate-together-more-often-during-the-pandemic-had-more-positive-interactions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05a9e789-cc7a-4406-b4ee-c8925dc6f241 Thu, 31 Oct 2024 10:25:00 -0400 Families who ate together more often during the pandemic had more positive interactions
关于基因、肠道微生物群和心理健康之间关系的新见解该研究确定了肠道微生物群、IBD 遗传变异和精神健康障碍之间的联系，为 CMD 的潜在生物标志物提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241031/New-insights-on-the-association- Between-genes-gut-microbiota-and-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241031/New-insights-on-the-association- Between-genes-gut-microbiota-and-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93baecaf-edaa-4523-b349-147a381b83d4 Thu, 31 Oct 2024 09:25:00 -0400 New insights on the association between genes, gut microbiota, and mental health
研究人员确定了 4 个基因特征以在症状出现前预测新生儿败血症该研究揭示了预测新生儿败血症的基因表达特征，强调了早期干预降低婴儿死亡率的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241031/Researchers-identify-4-gene-signature-to-predict-neonatal-sepsis-before-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241031/Researchers-identify-4-gene-signature-to-predict-neonatal-sepsis-before-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6870ab82-665b-41ed-bf2f-953e76041aa7 Thu, 31 Oct 2024 08:53:00 -0400 Researchers identify 4-gene signature to predict neonatal sepsis before symptoms
VALANX Biotech 和 Fina Biosolutions 推出 ClickCRM 用于快速结合疫苗开发VALANX Biotech (VALANX) 是一家在药物和诊断发现中开发位点特异性蛋白质缀合新技术的生物技术公司，与 Fina Biosolutions LLC (FinaBio) 是缀合疫苗开发和缀合化学方面的专家，今天宣布签署联合知识产权和许可协议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241031/VALANX-Biotech-And-Fina-Biosolutions-Introduce-Clickcrm-For-Rapid-Conjugate-Vaccine-Development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241031/VALANX-Biotech-And-Fina-Biosolutions-Introduce-Clickcrm-For-Rapid-Conjugate-Vaccine-Development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d07fa0d3-2aab-4b64-a754-1a2f9c0208f0 Thu, 31 Oct 2024 08:20:00 -0400 VALANX Biotech and Fina Biosolutions Introduce ClickCRM for Rapid Conjugate Vaccine Development
睡眠在心脏康复中的关键作用研究人员研究了睡眠如何影响心脏病发作后的炎症和恢复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241031/The-crucial-role-of-sleep-in-heart-healing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241031/The-crucial-role-of-sleep-in-heart-healing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5b9424d-7410-426f-ba3e-d5d7de9767b1 Thu, 31 Oct 2024 06:50:00 -0400 The crucial role of sleep in heart healing
绘制肿瘤微环境图：发现空间亚克隆以改善癌症治疗研究人员研究癌细胞的空间组织和肿瘤微环境。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241031/Mapping-tumor-microenvironments-Uncovering-spatial-subclones-for-improved-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241031/Mapping-tumor-microenvironments-Uncovering-spatial-subclones-for-improved-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9025a9e-fb45-40e9-bf04-83f36e354b23 Thu, 31 Oct 2024 05:54:00 -0400 Mapping tumor microenvironments: Uncovering spatial subclones for improved cancer treatment
索马鲁肽可降低超重慢性肾病患者的尿白蛋白与肌酐比值研究人员调查了索马鲁肽在控制超重慢性肾病患者尿白蛋白与肌酐比值方面的临床疗效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241031/Semaglutide-reduces-urine-albumin-to-creatinine-ratio-in-overweight-chronic-kidney-disease-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241031/Semaglutide-reduces-urine-albumin-to-creatinine-ratio-in-overweight-chronic-kidney-disease-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b683d655-9ec2-493a-ae45-6bb67d0805b0 Thu, 31 Oct 2024 05:39:00 -0400 Semaglutide reduces urine albumin-to-creatinine ratio in overweight chronic kidney disease patients
世卫组织扩大了mpox诊断的紧急使用清单作为增强有质量保证的检测方案的持续努力的一部分，世界卫生组织 (WHO) 在其紧急使用清单 (EUL) 程序下列出了另外两种 MPOX 体外诊断产品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/WHO-expands-Emergency-Use-Listing-for-mpox-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241030/WHO-expands-Emergency-Use-Listing-for-mpox-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c3007b4-8ba6-41ad-970f-c08aba2646ab Wed, 30 Oct 2024 20:41:00 -0400 WHO expands Emergency Use Listing for mpox diagnostics
